thread.title: R20m in drugs found in upmarket Sandhurst home
thread.title_full: R20m in drugs found in upmarket Sandhurst home | News24

author: news24.com
title: R20m in drugs found in upmarket Sandhurst home
text:
Johannesburg - Mandrax tablets and powder with an estimated street value of at least R20m was discovered at a house in Sandhurst, an upmarket suburb north of Johannesburg, the Hawks said on Friday.
"The house and cottage [on the property] were used as drug labs. We found thousands of Mandrax tablets and ready-made powder left to dry to be made into more tablets," spokesperson Lieutenant Robert Netshiunda said.
A South African man, 28, was arrested at the house on Thursday night around 22:00. Another man who was also at the house managed to flee.
Police were acting on a tip-off.
